Created attachment 579537
appletmenu.zip

User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10_7_2) AppleWebKit/535.2 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/15.0.874.121 Safari/535.2

Steps to reproduce:

We have a Java Applet that is running in the browser, which has a menu bar with multiple menus. 


Actual results:

When we click on the menu title and attempt to mouse down over the menu options -- no matter which menu we are in -- the currently selected menu is closed and the first menu in the bar is opened. This makes any Java applications using menus completely unusable.


Expected results:

The currently selected menu should have stayed open and allowed selection within that menu, rather than opening a completely different menu.
